name: Stunt Corgi VR
description: You are the parent of one daring corgi that dreams of being the most famous stunt pet in the world! Place your props, build the course and direct your corgi's routine. Call “Action!” to watch the stunt unfold. It won't always go the way you plan, but that's the fun!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Based on Low Settings
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD RYZEN 7 1700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or AMD RX 480 Storage: 2 GB available space
